Package metrics

Class AccuracyScore<T>

java.lang.Object
metrics.AccuracyScore<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a generic type for the class
All Implemented Interfaces:
AverageScore
public class AccuracyScore<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AverageScore
This class implements the AverageScore interface. This class implements an accuracy score calculation given a list of predicted data and actual classification data. In order to get the score one should invoke getScore() method.
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
AverageScore

  • Constructor Details

    • AccuracyScore

      public AccuracyScore​(java.util.List<T> predicted, java.util.List<T> actual)
      The constructor method. Receives a list of generic type with the predicted data and the actual classification data. Then with that data, calculates a score and saves it inside a double. In order to access that score, one should invoke getScore() method.
      Parameters:
      predicted - A List of generics with the predicted data
      actual - A List of generics with the actual classification data

  • Method Details

    • getScore

      public double getScore()
      A method that returns the accuracy score previously calculated.
      Specified by:
      getScore in interface AverageScore
      Returns:
      A double with the accuracy score
